instructions: Enforce docs/style_guide.md and docs/testing_policy.md. Prefer minimal diffs. Flag security issues, correctness bugs, and missing tests. If you recommend a change, also recommend a test that would fail before and pass after.

files.description: Repository style guide - coding standards and conventions
Testing and coverage policy - test requirements and thresholds

rules.rule: Do not suggest style-only changes if formatter/linter already enforces it.
Security-sensitive changes must include a brief risk note in the PR description.
New public functions must have explicit return types (TypeScript) or type hints (Python).
Test files must follow naming convention: *.test.ts, *.test.js, or test_*.py

other.content: This repo uses squash merges and Conventional Commit PR titles for Release Please. Review comments should reference PR-title semantics when release impact is relevant.
All GitHub Actions must be pinned to full SHA (not tags) for security. See docs/security_baseline.md for details.
